PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05182022-05-18,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add fourteen (14) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) impose a ban on imports and exports of luxury goods; and (3) impose a ban on the export of a list of goods that could be used in the production and manufacturing of weapons by Russia.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0102 Publication Date: 2022-06-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add fourteen (14) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) impose a ban on imports and exports of luxury goods; and (3) impose a ban on the export of a list of goods that could be used in the production and manufacturing of weapons by Russia.
